sourceMeaningMnemonic: You lift the <radical>lid</radical> off a manhole and there's a <radical>towel</radical> with the name of a <kanji>city</kanji> on it.
meaningInfo: Picture this towel with the name of a city on it. Any city you like. Maybe it's your city!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>city</kanji> must have a lot of <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>) because there is a sheep monogram on the towel. It's the sheep city.
readingInfo: Imagine a city that has a sheep for its mascot. This city was built on sheep, don't you say a bad word about sheep when you're there.
